Articles.Content:
The legendary Harrier jumpjet is brought into KSP!

Here is a video:

This marvelous machine can do VTOL/STOVL operations as well as conventional flight.

The craft is powered by 2 Rolls-Royce horizontal engines and 1 vertical basic kebal jet engine.

Here is the military version with 2 bombs, 2 heavy missiles and 2 cruise missiles:

How to fly:

VTOL:

Activate vertical engine, full throttle to increase altitude, 2/3 of thrust is for hover, 1.2/3 for landing.

CTOL:

Activate horizontal engines, full throttle and pitch back.

STOVL:

Activate all engines and pull back.

Action groups:

1-Toggle horizontal engines

2-Toggle VTOL engine

Product comes with ladder.

100% ease of control and stability.

Downloads:

Standard Variant

Weaponised

Property of Zokesia Skunkworks.

Edited April 3, 2014 by iDan122

Looks cool but needs weapons

Like mine:
I might add weapons although I am terrible at making weapons, I don't really know how, I need a tut or a training course.
If you need weapons, I'm your man

Nobody's said anything about the plane

IT's great!

Guys if you like the plane you can click that icon under my nickname, it looks liked star.

It is next to the Blog this post button
Is it stock? and what version is it for?

This is quite nice. It even works well with FAR.

As tested in FAR:

VTOL Flight is good. Controllable without SAS with some effort, with SAS it's nice to fly.

Fwd Flight is fun to yank n bank. Def have to have room to turn it or pull through loops and dives, but it's more fun to fly it like that at high speed.

It looks great too which makes it worthy of being called a Harrier.

Looks awesome. Great job!

Updated! The fuel pump system was abit messed up before, all the fuel was drained from the middle tank but the 2 other were never used.

VTOL will last about half of that.
